org.owasp.esapi.util
Class PrimWrap

java.lang.Object
  org.owasp.esapi.util.PrimWrap

public class PrimWrap
extends java.lang.Object

Standin for possible future caching of primitives in wrapper classes. Currently this does no such thing but it is here to make that possiblity more easy in the future when back porting code that does autoboxing...
